comment.author: 50751138@N02
comment._content: Thanks for sharing your photos in Flickr Coffee Cups. It is much appreciated and fun to see how we all love our Coffee one way or the other. If you come across any other coffee cups that would be a great addition to our group please invite them via the code below. Thank you and we look forward to more beautiful cups – Bjarne.
